author: rhuijben
msg: Switch libsvn_ra_serf's http error parser to the transition based xml parser
and at the same time stop ignoring most multi response status reports, such
as used by property and revision property changes.
(svn_ra_serf__server_error_t): Replace some variables by a list of internal
per path/property items that is later parsed into an error.
(handle_response): Update caller. Extract some code to
(svn_ra_serf__error_on_status): Provide handling for a few more status values.
(expat_response_handler): Make sure we don't convert an existing error parser.
(invalid_propvalues): Remove XFail marker. We just see the error after this
patch (and the requested detailed message after r1553441).

author: apurtell
msg: Revert HBASE-10238. Revert initial commit and addendum

author: rhuijben
msg: (build_error_chain): Always produce an error message, even when the
svn_error_t specifies a default message. In general mod_dav doesn't
transfer the apr status code for us so there is no way to retrieve
the message on the client by just its value, and the small list of
http status makes it hard to guess the right cause on the client

author: spamassassin_role
msg: updated scores for revision 1553361 active rules added since last mass-check

author: apurtell
msg: Amend HBASE-10238. Special case for UndeclaredThrowableException
